summary: The SBIR Commercialization Improvement Act (H.R. 4842) amends the Small Business Act to enhance the Small Business Innovation Research (SBIR) and Small Business Technology Transfer (STTR) programs. It mandates workforce training on Phase III acquisitions for federal agency personnel, including topics like program goals and Phase III agreement execution. The bill also directs the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to modify policy directives to promote the use of SBIR/STTR products in Phase III and simplifies procedures for Phase III awards and market research.
